name: SLIME ESCAPE (juba7)
description:
My submission for LD44

SLIME ESCAPE :
you incarnate a creature create in the laboratory to which one gives the name of "SLIME", you evolved, and now you want to escape from this place. to get there you will have to go through all the traps that scientists have put to prevent you from going out, the only solution is to sacrifice your life to evolve and have the right skills.
